newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: Delifrance Asia debuts at S$0.87.
newsitem.headline: Delifrance Asia debuts at S$0.87.

text.p: Shares of Delifrance Asia Ltd debuted at Singapore $0.87 each on Monday against an initial public offer price of S$0.78.
At 0120 GMT, the shares were trading at S$0.95 on volume of 8.7 million shares, after hitting a high of S$0.965.
The French-style cafe and bakeries chain's initial public offer of 45.16 million shares was 5.5 times subscribed.
The offer price represented a historical price-earnings ratio of 17.26 times.
"The shares are a buy at up to around S$0.90," said an analyst with a foreign broking firm.
